document.full_text: fame has its "ups and downs," even for canadian teenaged singing sensation justin bieber who is enjoying a lot of "ups" these days on his european tour that has now spread "biebermania" to belgium.
document.title: "biebermania" spreads to belgium
lines_and_colors: fame has its "ups and downs," even for canadian teenaged singing sensation justin bieber who is enjoying a lot of "ups" these days on his european tour that has now spread "biebermania" to belgium.
